home.heroDesc: Online courses, blog, digital products, and direct mentoring—from practitioners for practitioners. Start from scratch or level up your skills.
home.offeringsSubtitle: Four ways to learn—choose what suits your needs best.
home.offering1Desc: Free & paid learning content—from basics to advanced. Self-paced, certificates, and structured materials.
home.offering2Desc: Articles, tutorials, and programming tips. Share knowledge through practical, easy-to-follow writing.
home.offering3Desc: Templates, starter kits, and ready-to-use apps. Save time with proven solutions.
home.offering4Desc: Hourly live sessions—technical discussions, code review, or project guidance. Booking available.
home.ctaSectionDesc: Try free first—explore courses and blog. Ready to level up? Continue to premium content or book mentoring.

footer.description: Education platform to learn programming—online courses, blog, digital products, and direct mentoring. Let's grow together.

courses.title: Online Courses
courses.subtitle: Structured content from basics to advanced. Some free, some paid—choose according to your needs.
courses.newCoursesNote: New courses will be added periodically. Follow updates via blog or social media.
courses.course1Desc: JS basics for beginners. Variables, functions, loops, and DOM manipulation.
courses.course2Desc: Learn React—components, hooks, state management, and building modern UIs.
courses.course3Desc: Build API and web app with Laravel. MVC, Eloquent, and authentication.

blog.title: Blog
blog.subtitle: Articles, tutorials, and programming tips—shared through practical writing.
blog.stayTuned: New articles published regularly. Stay tuned!
blog.post1Title: 5 Tips for Learning Programming Without Burnout
blog.post1Excerpt: Learning to code requires consistency. Check out how to stay productive without mental exhaustion.

blog.post2Excerpt: Comparison of the two popular frameworks to help you decide for your project.

blogDetail.post1Content: Learning to code requires consistency. Here's how to stay productive without mental exhaustion.

products.title: Digital Products
products.subtitle: Templates, starter kits, and ready-to-use apps—save development time with proven solutions.
products.newProductsNote: New products will be added over time. Want to request a specific product? Contact via mentoring.
products.product1Desc: Ready-to-use fullstack boilerplate—auth, API, modern frontend. Save time on new project setup.
products.product2Desc: Responsive admin dashboard with sidebar, tables, charts. Customizable for your needs.
products.product3Desc: Modular landing page components—hero, features, pricing. Copy-paste and customize.
products.product4Desc: Expense tracking SaaS—wallets, transactions, subscriptions. React + Express + PostgreSQL. Full demo with auth and billing.

mentoring.title: 1-on-1 Mentoring
mentoring.subtitle: Hourly live sessions—technical discussion, code review, or project guidance. Booking available according to schedule.
mentoring.rateNote: Price may vary depending on topic and duration.
mentoring.step1Desc: Describe the topic, goals, and schedule preference. Include repo link if there's code review.
mentoring.step2Desc: I'll reply with available slots. After we agree, the meeting link will be sent.
mentoring.step3Desc: Meet via Google Meet/Zoom. Session focused on what you need.

seo.homeTitle: Pintarware — Learn & Grow Together | Courses, Blog, Mentoring
seo.homeDesc: Pintarware — Indonesia programming education platform. Free & paid online courses, tutorial blog, digital products, and 1-on-1 mentoring. Learn PHP, Laravel, React, Vue, Node.js.
